mapper.select: SELECT STU_NO, NAME, KOR, ENG, MATH, AVE, GRADE FROM STUDENT ORDER BY STU_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT (STU_NO , NAME , KOR , ENG , MATH , AVE , GRADE) VALUES (STUDENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{name} , #{kor} , #{eng} , #{math} , (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 ,CASE WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 90 THEN 'A' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 80 THEN 'B' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 70 THEN 'C' WHEN (#{kor} + #{eng} + #{math}) / 3 >= 60 THEN 'D' ELSE 'F' END)
